thread.title: Divers in Portugal stunned by spectacular sunfish
thread.title_full: Divers in Portugal stunned by spectacular sunfish

title: Divers in Portugal stunned by spectacular sunfish
text:
Divers in Portugal stunned by spectacular sunfish Last updated 12:42, October 14 2015 YouTube 
A group of divers off the coast of Portugal were left stunned by the arrival of an epic sunfish 
A video has captured the moment divers off the coast of Portugal stumbled upon a giant sunfish. 
The clip, reportedly filmed in 2013, shows the divers swimming alongside the epic fish, who doesn't seem to mind being the centre of attention. 
According to National Geographic , the sunfish, or mola, are the heaviest of the world's bony fish. YOUTUBE/SCREENGRAB 
Divers captured the moment they came across this giant sunfish off the coast of Portugal. 
Large specimens can reach 4.2 vertical meters, 3.1 horizontal and can weigh up to 2268kgs.
